data.value: Add custom code to the HTML head section

data.name: areYouSure
data.value: Are you sure you want to {0} {1}?

data.name: beTheFirstToRate
data.value: Budi prvi koji je ocjenio ovaj tekst

data.name: blogMLDescription
data.value: BlogEngine.NET uses BlogML as the format for exporting. The import supports both BlogML and RSS.

data.name: commentWasSaved
data.value: Komentar je zapisa. Hvala na sudjelovanju

data.name: defaultTextShownInSearchField
data.value: The default text shown in the search textbox

data.name: enableCommentsDescription
data.value: If comments aren't enabled, nobody can write comments to any post.

data.name: enableHttpCompressionDescription
data.value: Makes the pages load faster (recommended). Changing this will re-start the website.

data.name: enableOpenSearchDescription
data.value: Adds the search feature to all new browsers (recommended).

data.name: enableSearchHighlightDescription
data.value: Colors the search words on the page.

data.name: home
data.comment: As used for linking to the front-page

data.name: separateTagsWitComma
data.value: Separate each tag with a comma

data.name: showCountryChooserDescription
data.value: If the country chooser isn't shown, no flag can be shown on each comment.

data.name: showEnableWebsiteInCommentsDescription
data.value: Choose whether to allow Website to be published in Comments

data.name: showDescriptionInPostListForPostsByTagOrCategory
data.value: Only show description of posts when listed by Tag or Category

data.name: trimStylesheetDescription
data.value: Makes all stylesheets of any theme smaller by removing all whitespace at runtime.

data.name: commentWaitingModeration
data.value: Hvala na sudjelovanju. Ovaj komnentar sada čeka moderiranje

data.name: requireSslForMetaWeblogApiDescription
data.value: Enforce the use of SSL when communicating with the MetaWeblog API

data.name: useBlogNameInPageTitles
data.value: Use blog name in page titles

data.name: useBlogNameInPageTitlesDescription
data.value: Prefixes the page titles with the name of the blog

data.name: filterByApmlDescription
data.value: Enter the URL to your website or to your APML document

data.name: enableCommentNestingDescription
data.value: This only works if the theme supports it.

data.name: commentNotificationUnsubscriptionText
data.value: You have been unsubscribed from email notifications for any future comments to this post.

data.name: commentNotificationUnsubscribe
data.value: Unsubscribe from future comment notification emails to this post.

data.value: Add to white list if at least

data.value: comments of this author have been approved

data.value: If comment was deleted, always block author

data.name: authorRejected
data.value: comments of this author have been rejected

data.name: commentsApprovedByAdmin
data.value: Manual - only after comment approved by admin will it show up in the blog

data.name: commentsAuto
data.value: Automatic - rules and filters will decide if comment is spam

data.name: commentsBlacklist
data.value: Add to black list if at least

data.name: commentsUnmodApproved
data.value: If not moderated, all comments approved by default

data.value: Are you sure you want to reset all counters to `0`?

data.value: Add to pages (in addition to posts)

data.value: Check this when you test disqus locally

data.name: disqusSignupMessage
data.value:
To use Disqus as your comment manager you need first set up account at disqus.com
Short name used to uniquely identify your website on Disqus (Website shortname in Basic Settings).

data.name: passwordRetrievalInstructionMessage
data.value: Upišite svoj email u polje iznad i zaporka će biti brzo poslana na email.

data.name: requiredPasswordLength
data.value: Nove zaporke moraju imati minimalno {0} znakova.

data.name: siteUnavailableConfirm
data.value: The website will be unavailable for a few seconds.\nAre you sure you wish to continue?

data.name: areYouSureDeleteRow
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this row?

data.name: enterValidNumberPositiveNegative
data.value: Molim upišite ispravan broj (positivan ili negativan)

data.name: onlyLoggedInCanView
data.value: Only logged in users can view posts (private blog)

data.name: trackingScriptDescription
data.value:
Visitor tracking script

The JavaScript code from i.e. Google Analytics.

Will be added in the bottom of each page regardless of the theme.

(remember to add the <script> tags)

data.value: Dobijte obavijest kada je napisan novi članak.

data.name: pendingApproval
data.value: Comments will be pending administrator's approval

data.name: Referrers_BindTable_Total
data.comment: Footer row text of first cell

data.name: allowRemoteFileDownloadsDescription
data.value: Allow the server's handlers to download/cache/process resources from other websites.

data.name: remoteTimeoutDescription
data.value: The maximum length of time(milliseconds) the server can spend downloading a remote resource. Set to 0 for unlimited. Default is 30000.

data.name: maximumRemoteFileSizeDescription
data.value: The maximum size in bytes of a remote file the server can download. Set to 0 for unlimited.

data.name: recaptchaConfigureReminder
data.value: Make sure the Recaptcha extension is enabled and properly configured.

data.name: whitelistIpOnCommentApproval
data.value: Automatically add IP Address of Comments you Approve to the white list.

data.name: blacklistIpOnCommentRejection
data.value: Automatically add IP Address of Comments you Reject to the black list.
